Articles.Content:
So I know, this is still sandbox...

But in a way I am attached to "my" sandbox...

I was reluctant to just timewarp to a transfer window.

But I just copied the complete folder, named it "Testing", and the reluctance is gone!

One probe underway to Jool, the Mars mission is staged, other missions in planning.

OFF we go!
Shouldn't this be in Mission Reports or Blogs or something like that?
insert your ship name

Well... it is not really a mission report. It is more about the block I had.

I was staging a huge exploration to Jool, complete with landers and everything... The window is so rare that I thought I had do do it all in one go. Same to other places... I even build a lander for Moho, because that window was earlier. (Yeah, right... do the hardest one first...)

But just renaming it "Testing", this block is gone!
You had some sort of..."Planetary attachment disorder" When one is too nervous about losing someone or something and cannot find the will to leave the planets SOI. I had that for a while.
